segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, To identify the function of the message and the type of document it corresponds to.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide document related dates, times or periods such as the creation date of the document.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments used to provide information related to parties involved at message level (e.g. issuing party, recipient, signing party).

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify a party and describe its function at message level.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide the address of the party.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide additional references related to the party. It could be references used by another party (e.g. Identification of a legal person at the Chamber of Commerce).

segment.name: Employment details
segment.documentation: EMP, To provide employment details in case the party is a natural person (in opposite to legal person).

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication information related to the party described in the PNA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments used to provide contact information and related communication numbers.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To provide contact information (department or person) within the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide contact related dates, times or periods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments used to provide communication information linked to validity periods.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication information related to the contact.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide communication and contact related dates, times or periods such as availability periods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments used to describe authentication information and dates related to the party.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, To provide the authentication result related to the Party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide authentication related dates, times or periods such as the date of authentication.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments used to describe a debts recovery case and to provide related information.

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation:
GIR, To identify the debts recovery case (case identification numbers: principal and the enacting party ones).
Note: In the submission phase of a debts recovery case the only case identification number known is the one assigned by the principal.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to provide attributes of the debts recovery case and related dates, times or periods.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide an attribute related to the debts recovery case such as the type of debt to which the debts recovery case relates.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide attributes related dates, times or periods.

segmentGroup.documentation:
Segment group 7: A group of segments used to describe events related to the debts recovery case processing and to provide related information such as associated reasons and requirements.
Note: It could be that more than one event is declared for one case (e.g. information that part of the debt has been paid and that the debtor is allowed to postpone the next payment).

segment.name: Event
segment.documentation: EVE, To identify an event.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates related to the event such as the date when the event occurred.

segment.name: Information required
segment.documentation: IRQ, To identify required information in relation with the event.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information related to the event.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments used to describe attributes and related dates.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide an attribute related to an event such as extra instructions.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods to the attribute.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: COM-SG10-SG12-SG14 A group of segments to identify all involved parties in debts recovery cases and provide related information.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify a party and his function.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide additional reference numbers used to identify the party.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide attributes related to the party such as the legal form or the legal status of a legal person.

segment.name: Employment details
segment.documentation: EMP, To identify the employment or profession of the party.

segment.name: Person demographic information
segment.documentation: PDI, To provide the marital status of the party when it is a natural person.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, To provide financial and banking information related to the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the party such as the date of birth for a natural person or the creation date for a legal person.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To provide monetary amounts related to the party such as the registered capital or share holding amount in the case of a legal person.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, To provide quantities related to the party such as the number of employees for a legal person.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To provide percentages related to the party such as the percentage of legal aid.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication information about the party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to describe contacts and related information of the party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, To provide contact information (department or person) of the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide contact related dates, times or periods.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information related to the contact.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to provide communication information about the contact.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication information of the contact.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates related to the communication information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to describe the addresses and related information of the party.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide the address of the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates related to the address.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to provide communication information related to the address of the party.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, To provide communication information related to the address of the party.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates related to the address.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to describe the relationship between the party and other parties (also described in the message).

segment.name: Relationship
segment.documentation: REL, To identify the type of relationship which exists between the currently described party and the party referenced (e.g. one party is the debtor, another party is a bank of the debtor).

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide the reference number of the party which has a relationship with the currently described party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments used to provide information about the justifying documents related to the debts recovery case such as titles.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, To describe the justifying document by providing its type and number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the document.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information related to the document such as a summary.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide attributes related to the document such as scope, legal value or notification channel of the document.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To provide monetary amounts involved in the document.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to identify parties related to the document such as issuing, certifying or third parties.

segment.name: Party identification
segment.documentation: PNA, To identify a party and his function related to the document.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide additional reference numbers used to identify the party.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide the address of the party.

segmentGroup.documentation:
Segment group 17: A group of segments to describe goods related to the debt recovery case. A distinction is made between: - real estate goods (e.g. buildings, houses), - other goods that can be described in a structured way (e.g. car, boat), - any good (e.g. computers) described in a textual way.
Note: - Goods described in this group of segments are part of the reason of the debts recovery case, - An occurrence of this group of segments relates to one good (e.g. a car, a computer), - An occurrence of this group describes the concerned good item either in a structured way, in a textual way (free text) or by referencing a document which contains the description of the good.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, To provide information related to the goods being described such as their type, reference or short description.

segment.name: Status
segment.documentation: STS, To provide the status of goods within the debt recovery case such as to mention that the goods have been stolen.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide a textual description of the goods.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide an attribute related to the goods being described such as a complement to its type.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to give a structured description of any good except real estate goods which are described in a dedicated group of segments.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide the reference of the goods being described such as the registration/license number for a car.

segment.name: Additional product id
segment.documentation: PIA, To provide additional identification numbers of the goods such as the serial number for a car.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, To provide location information of the goods.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the goods such as the year for a car.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, To provide measures related to the goods such as the power of an engine in kW.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide attributes of the goods such the color or the type (private, commercial) of a car.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information about the Goods.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments to give a structured description of real estate goods.

segment.name: Address
segment.documentation: ADR, To provide the address of a real estate good.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments to provide detailed information about a real estate good.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide a reference of the real estate good such as section numbers.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide additional textual information such as the nature, designation of the real estate good.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, To provide measures of the real estate good such as the size of a section.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to refer to a document that contains a detailed description of the goods.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, To provide the reference and type of the document which details the goods.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the document such as the issuing date.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information related to the document such as a summary.

segmentGroup.documentation:
Segment group 22: A group of segments to describe all debt components (sets of monetary amounts) related to the debts recovery case.
Note: - Each occurrence of this group of segments corresponds to one monetary component. - When using this group of segments one of its sub-groups is mandatory.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, To provide the type of structure used for describing the debt component in the following sub-groups: - reference to a document which contains all relevant information, - all amounts are detailed in the message, - reference to a document and detailed amounts are both given in the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the debt component such as the beginning or end of a debt component period.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information about the debt component.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments used to provide information related to the document describing the debt component.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, To provide information about the document by providing its type and number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide dates, times or periods related to the document such as the issuing date.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information about the document such as a summary.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments to provide a detailed description of all monetary amounts that are part of the debt component.

segment.name: Monetary amount function
segment.documentation: ARD, To qualify the monetary amount within the debt component.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, To identify the purpose of the monetary amount such as amount paid or revised amount.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide amount related dates, times or periods.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, To provide tax information related to the amount.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, To provide textual information related to the amounts.

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, To provide attributes related to the amounts.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segment to describe percentages related to the monetary amount.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, To provide percentage information related to the amount.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, To provide a date, a time or a period related to the percentage.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 26: To provide payment information related to the amounts.

segment.name: Payment instructions
segment.documentation: PAI, To provide payment details such as payment conditions, means or channel.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, To provide references related to payment instructions such as credit transfer reference number.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, To provide message control totals such as the total of all due amounts in all debts recovery cases mentioned in the message.
